entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22 except minus 10 in a few localities.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22 except minus 10 in a few localities. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10 except minus 4 in a few localities.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 10 except minus 4 in a few localities. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 04 January 2023
